base_description: Wall-mounted toilet, white with black seat.
part_description: Consists of a white ceramic base and a black seat lid. The base is triangular, mounted to the wall, while the seat is oval and sits on top.
internal_interaction_description: The black seat lid is hinged to the white ceramic base, allowing it to be lifted or closed. The seat aligns with the base to provide a comfortable sitting area, and the lid can be adjusted for use or cleaning.
external_interaction_description: Designed for use in bathrooms, it connects to plumbing for waste disposal. Users interact by lifting the lid to use the toilet and lowering it afterward. It may also be cleaned with standard bathroom cleaning products.
